name: Seeping Heaven
description:
Seeping Heaven

Powerful forces are about to shake the once peaceful heavens. As the Bells of Heaven signal destruction, one virtue must go through numerous obstacles and determine his fate. 

Seeping Heaven is a 2D vertical shoot 'em up, bullet hell, with a little story, cute chibi graphics and anime styled art. There are 5 levels, each with a unique boss character. 

*** This game is also available as a downloadable file - one in which you can save your progress***

Keyboard Controls

ARROWS: Movement

WASD: Shoot

SPACE: Special Ability (-3 energy)

C: Heal (-5 energy)

Q: Quit to Menu

R: Restart Level

Programming

AGU

Dev Talk

Finally, the first released version of the my very first game! I hope it's enjoyable. There will be at least one update to content in the future. Until then, I look forward to seeing your feedback regarding any improvements, bugs, and difficulty. Thank you so much for viewing!
